title: Problem 2042_C
statement: Alice and Bob participate in a fishing contest! In total, they caught n fishes, numbered from 1 to n (the bigger the fish, the greater its index). Some of these fishes were caught by Alice, others — by Bob.Their performance will be evaluated as follows. First, an integer m will be chosen, and all fish will be split into m non-empty groups. The first group should contain several (at least one) smallest fishes, the second group — several (at least one) next smallest fishes, and so on. Each fish sh
